definition[0]: the process of testing various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
definition[1]: the process of performing scientific tests to find out if a particular idea is true or to obtain more information
example[1]: The issue of animal experimentation is an emotive subject.
definition[2]: when you try doing something to find out what it feels like, for example having sex or using illegal drugs
example[2]: There is often a period of sexual experimentation during adolescence.
